metadata.name: Particle Fiction
metadata.description: Collecting the first six months of the critically acclaimed webcomic, Particle Fiction Volume 1 includes a touch of science fiction, fantasy, crime thriller and much more! "Particle Fiction by David Wynne is the latest monthly web series to have us impatiently drumming our fingers on the desk as we wait for the first of the month to roll around" - SFX Magazine Rather than being one single, ongoing storyline, Particle Fiction features a rotating main feature; one month may be a gritty crime story in a modern realistic setting, while the next might be a science fiction story set in the far reaches of space, the one after that a whimsical all-ages fantasy.
